summary: An alternate appearance for General Tullius to give him a younger, taller and more imposing look.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces vanilla Tullius with a taller and younger version of himself.

I thought this would be an interesting mod to make. Vanilla Tullius never impressed me much during my playthough, he\'s depicted as a short old man, and there\'s nothing wrong with that, but I was interested in seeing how the game would feel with a much more younger and physically imposing General Tullius, as he would have been in his prime, the results are quite nice I reckon. I\'ve included two files, one for a younger Tullius who is clean shaven, and one for a younger Tullius who, in fitting with his post in freezing Skyrim, has grown a beard like another famously depicted Roman General...but I\'ll let you guess who.

I give you General Tullius, Commander of the armies of the North, loyal servant to the Emperor Tidus Mede the Second.

- Sky999
author: Sky999
